data.actual_result: Embed allows you to try and accept the gift even though it fails
data.expected_result: Embed should not let you accept the gift because you have Nitro
data.short_description: Able to accept Nitro gift from mobile if you have Nitro already even though it fails
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have Nitro - Purchase Nitro as a gift - Send the link in a channel - View the embed on iOS and try to accept it
